housinglib package

housinglib.housinglib module

src.housinglib.housinglib.data_prep(housing_path)[source]

data_prep function prepares the data for training. It returns the datasets and imputer namely

Parameters

housing_path – Path to save the datasets

Return type

housing_prepared, housing_labels, strat_test_set, imputer.

src.housinglib.housinglib.desc_tree(housing_prepared, housing_labels)[source]

This function trains the data on the decision tree regressor.

Parameters

  • housing_prepared – prepared dataset for training.

  • housing_labels – Labels of the data frame.

Return type

RMSE, MAE.

src.housinglib.housinglib.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)[source]

This function fetches the data from the input url and downloads the file in the provided local path.

Parameters

  • housing_url – link to download the dataset

  • housing_path – Path to save the datasets

src.housinglib.housinglib.income_cat_proportions(data)[source]
src.housinglib.housinglib.lin_reg(housing_prepared, housing_labels)[source]

Trains the linear regression model

Parameters

  • housing_prepared – prepared dataset for training.

  • housing_labels – Labels of the data frame.

Return type

RMSE, MAE.

src.housinglib.housinglib.load_data(housing_path)[source]

load_data function loads the data to the data/raw folder in the main folder structure.

Parameters

housing_path – Path to save the datasets

src.housinglib.housinglib.load_housing_data(housing_path)[source]

This function loads the data from the in put path and returns the pandas dataframe.

Parameters

housing_path – Path to save the datasets

Return type

data_frame from the input file.

src.housinglib.housinglib.random_forest(housing_prepared, housing_labels, strat_test_set, imputer)[source]

This function trains the data on the random foreset regressor for different params.

Parameters

  • housing_prepared – prepared dataset for training.

  • housing_labels – Labels of the data frame.

  • strat_test_set – test set for checking the score of the model.

  • imputer – imputer used while preparing train data.

Return type

RMSE, MAE, final_model.
